item.title: Hugo
item.author: Author
item.description: Note Hugo’s directory structure Hugo’s directory structure archetypes: Archetypes are content template files that contain preconfigured front matter (date, title, draft). You can create new archetypes with custom preconfigured front matter fields. assets: Assets folder stores all the files, which are processed by Hugo Pipes. (e.g. CSS/Sass files) This directory is not created by default. config.toml: Hugo uses the config.toml, config.
